ygData.subject: RE: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m using the same technique. Here s another question about archery - I heard that archery maxes out at 75. True or untrue?
ygData.messageBody:
>To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
>From: "Sir Flann Greystone" <sirnjord@...>
>
>To my knowledge there is no archery range in-game. The skill must be
>increased by using it.
>
>When I was level 5 I put 14 training points into archery. I then used
>archery as my first strike against all opponents and continue to >do so
>each time I level until my archery is maxed. I am now a level >11 ranger
>and my archery skill maxed at 60 before I reached the first >bubble toward
>level 12, so I know this method works.
>
>With a good "jump start" archery will max each level with use.
>
>Flann
>Cazik-Thule


I'm using the same technique. Here's another question about archery - I
heard that archery maxes out at 75. True or untrue?
